snippet: Highlights from Martha Clara Vineyards in Riverhead include a zesty chardonnay, a palate-cleansing sauvignon blanc and a six-red blend called Five-O.
abstract: Howard G Goldberg Long Island Vines column reviews wines from Martha Clara Vineyards in Riverhead (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: Highlights from Martha Clara Vineyards in Riverhead include a zesty chardonnay, a palate-cleansing sauvignon blanc and a six-red blend called Five-O.

headline.seo: At Martha Clara Vineyards, From a Nickname to a Label
